section.title: Tokenizer Enumeration
section.simpara: The tokenizer enumeration is the first phase of processing in the compiler, taking the raw input and converting it into a series of tokens that can be processed into an AST by the parser component. In some sense it serves to lift the abstraction level of the input to simplify further component specifications. This might have been done with some type of abstraction level in the stimuli descriptions themselves, but since this is a pretty important part of the system, it was better to specify it as a set of enumerations instead.
